price: Deε wͻka ara ne sε: “Woi deε εyε nkonyaa anaa naadaasεm pefee.
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqālū in hādhā illā siḥ'run mubīnun
